data.message: Some of you folks being disrespectful to Em!! Everyone deserves a break did you ever think he might've wanted to spend more time with his daughter? Dam and if you the ones that being rude don't like him anymore or tired of waiting for his new single to come out then yall ain't loyal fans!! And why yall be following him if you gonna hate on anything he does?? Dam folks if you not gonna be polite , respectful to EM then don't follow he is a human being dam keep it nice.  I'll wait as long as I have to for his new 💿 CD comes out!#Loyalty

replies.message: Very well said!!! He's a father first gotta respect him for that!!
